TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract beforefieldinit HiLoValueGenerator`1<TValue> extends Microsoft.EntityFrameworkCore.ValueGeneration.ValueGenerator`1<!TValue>
Public MustInherit Class HiLoValueGenerator(Of TValue) Inherits ValueGenerator(Of TValue)

Docs.typeparam: The type of values that are generated.
Docs.summary: Acts as a by requesting a block of values from the underlying database and returning them one by one. Will ask the underlying database for another block when the current block is exhausted.
Docs.remarks: A block is represented by a low value fetched from the database, and then a block size that indicates how many sequential values can be used, starting from the low value, before a new low value must be fetched from the database.
See EF Core value generation for more information and examples.
